tool_name: Distance Calculation API by Pizza API
tool_description: The Distance Calculation API is incredibly simple to use. Simply provide the latitude and longitude coordinates of the two locations you want to measure and the metric whether you want the result to be in km, mi (miles), m(metres), feet,  and the API will return the distance between them in a user-friendly format. The API uses the latest algorithms and techniques to provide fast and accurate results, making it the ideal solution for developers who need to incorporate distance calculation into...
title: Distance Calculation API by Pizza API

api_list.name: Calculate distance  By Lat & Long
api_list.description: Calculate Distance between to place by their latitude and longitudes and metric you want the output of.
